body_html: it looks like you are using a private PyPI server pypi.v2ex.com. On this server, the torch package does not exist. Maybe you are on a private firewall that restricts which pypi packages you can install?

body: it looks like you are using a private PyPI server `pypi.v2ex.com`. On this server, the `torch` package does not exist. Maybe you are on a private firewall that restricts which pypi packages you can install?
